name: Roko Cancer Charitable Trust
briefDescription: A first - ever Fully Equipped Mobile Breast Cancer Detection Unit that takes a journey for a cause through the tough terrains of Meghalaya, Punjab, Delhi, Maharashtra, Goa, Karnataka, Jammu and Kashmir, Himachal Pradesh, Madhya Pradesh, West Bengal, Gujarat, Haryana, Uttar Pradesh, Andhra Pradesh and Tamil Nadu, has in a short span touched a figure of over 13,269 mammograms and 432 positive plus 3,344 (Followups/ advised/Under study) and examined 56,838 person that is nothing less than remarkable. We want to inspire an undying spirit of waging a war against ignorance towards Breast Cancer globally with the message.
